headline: Solventum bolsters wound care portfolio with $850m Acera Surgical acquisition
summary: Solventum views the acquisition as part of a broader growth transformation plan to reshape its portfolio and strengthen its balance sheet.

raw.headline: Solventum bolsters wound care portfolio with $850m Acera Surgical acquisition
raw.summary: Solventum views the acquisition as part of a broader growth transformation plan to reshape its portfolio and strengthen its balance sheet.

headline: Solventum: Setting Up For Growth And A Re-Rating
summary: Solventum gains post-divestiture strength with lower debt, organic growth, $850M deal, a $1B buyback, and $500M savings goals. Learn why SOLV stock is a hold.

raw.headline: Solventum: Setting Up For Growth And A Re-Rating
